episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.description: American football coach Ted Lasso is hired by a wealthy divorcée to coach the English soccer team AFC Richmond.

episodes.title: Biscuits
episodes.description: It's Ted's first day of coaching, and fans aren't happy. He makes little headway but remains undeterred as the team plays its first match.

episodes.title: Trent Crimm: The Independent
episodes.description: To arrange an in-depth exposé, Rebecca pairs cynical journalist Trent Crimm with Ted for a day. Ted and Roy venture into the community.

episodes.title: For the Children
episodes.description: Rebecca hosts the team's annual charity benefit, where Ted stages a reconciliation between Roy and Jamie.

episodes.title: Tan Lines
episodes.description: With his wife and son visiting from America, Ted makes drastic changes to the lineup during a critical match.

episodes.title: Two Aces
episodes.description: When Jamie refuses to train, Ted turns to talented new signing Dani Rojas—and the team is struck by an age-old curse.

episodes.title: Make Rebecca Great Again
episodes.description: Rebecca celebrates her first anniversary as a divorcée as the team plays a match in Liverpool.

episodes.title: The Diamond Dogs
episodes.description: Ted and Roy are both having relationship problems. Ted consults the Diamond Dogs while Roy has a talk with Keeley.

episodes.title: All Apologies
episodes.description: After a series of mistakes on the pitch, pressure mounts to bench Roy. Rebecca drops a bombshell.

episodes.title: The Hope That Kills You
episodes.description: Richmond plays a climactic match that will determine the fates of Ted and his club.

episodes.title: Goodbye Earl
episodes.description: AFC Richmond brings in a sports psychologist to help the team overcome their unprecedented seven game tie-streak.

episodes.title: Lavender
episodes.description: Ted is surprised by the reappearance of a familiar face. Roy tries out a new gig.

episodes.title: Do the Right-est Thing
episodes.description: Rebecca has a special visitor shadow her at work. A player's return is not welcomed by the team.

episodes.title: Carol of the Bells
episodes.description: It's Christmas in Richmond. Rebecca enlists Ted for a secret mission, Roy and Keeley search for a miracle, and the Higginses open up their home.

episodes.title: Rainbow
episodes.description: Nate learns how to be assertive from Keeley and Rebecca. Ted asks Roy for a favor.

episodes.title: The Signal
episodes.description: Ted is fired up that the new team dynamic seems to be working. But will they have a chance in the quarterfinal?

episodes.title: Headspace
episodes.description: With things turning around for Richmond, it's time for everyone to work on their issues—like Ted's discomfort, Nate's confidence, and Roy's attention.

episodes.title: Man City
episodes.description: Ted and Dr. Sharon realize they might have to meet each other halfway. Tensions are high as the team prepares for the semifinal.

episodes.title: Beard After Hours
episodes.description: After the semifinal, Beard sets out on an all-night odyssey through London in an effort to collect his thoughts.

episodes.title: No Weddings and a Funeral
episodes.description: Rebecca is stunned by a sudden loss. The team rallies to show their support, but Ted finds himself grappling with a piece of his past.

episodes.title: Midnight Train to Royston
episodes.description: A billionaire football enthusiast from Ghana makes Sam an unbelievable offer. Ted plans something special for Dr. Sharon's last day with the team.

episodes.title: Inverting the Pyramid of Success
episodes.description: Richmond gets their final chance to win promotion as Ted deals with the fallout of Trent Crimm's painfully honest exposé.

episodes.title: Smells Like Mean Spirit
episodes.description: The newly promoted AFC Richmond face mockery as pundits predict they'll finish dead last this season.

episodes.title: (I Don't Want to Go to) Chelsea
episodes.description: News of a top player looking to move to London sends the English clubs into a frenzy. Richmond play their first game back in the Premier League.
Richmond adjust to an exciting change, but Jamie has reservations. Ted learns there's something new going on back in Kansas as well.

episodes.title: Big Week
episodes.description: Everyone's feeling the pressure as Richmond gear up to play West Ham. Ted is reunited with an old friend.

episodes.title: Signs
episodes.description: With their season in a tailspin, Richmond try to right the ship against mighty Manchester City. Off the pitch, everyone faces their own setbacks.

episodes.title: Sunflowers
episodes.description: A friendly match takes the team to Amsterdam, where one night out unlocks truths for many.

episodes.title: The Strings That Bind Us
episodes.description: The Greyhounds try a new strategy that has everyone thinking outside the box. Sam prepares to host a VIP guest at Ola's.

episodes.title: We'll Never Have Paris
episodes.description: While watching Henry, Ted fights the urge to spiral when Michelle and Dr. Jacob go on a romantic trip. An online leak has massive implications for Keeley.

episodes.title: La Locker Room Aux Folles
episodes.description: Colin and Isaac's friendship is tested. Roy is asked to do a press conference.

episodes.title: International Break
episodes.description: While some of the Greyhounds head home to play for their countries in international matches, Edwin Akufo brings a business proposal to Rebecca.

episodes.title: Mom City
episodes.description: An unexpected guest has Ted on edge. When Richmond travel to Manchester for a big match, Roy and Keeley become concerned about Jamie.

episodes.title: So Long, Farewell
episodes.description: AFC Richmond play their final game of the season.
